sentences.en: ‘I haven't a clue!’ ‘That makes two of us.’.
sentences.cn: “我没有任何线索！”“我也一样。”。

sentences.en: a minute or two had passed.
sentences.cn: 一两分钟过去了。

sentences.en: a minute or two had passed.
sentences.cn: 一两分钟过去了。

sentences.en: a minute or two had passed.
sentences.cn: 一两分钟过去了。

sentences.en: a minute or two had passed.
sentences.cn: 一两分钟过去了。

sentences.en: After his elevation to the papacy, he reigned for two years.
sentences.cn: 他升任教皇后在位两年。

sentences.en: cut the sandwich in two.
sentences.cn: 把三明治切成两半

sentences.en: Give the cardboard two or three coats of varnish to harden it.
sentences.cn: 在纸板上涂两三层清漆使其变硬。

sentences.en: He bowled so well that we won two matches.
sentences.cn: 他的球投得极棒，使我们赢下了两场比赛。

sentences.en: He lost two stone in weight during his time there.
sentences.cn: 他在那儿的时候体重下降了2英石。

sentences.en: His family moved to Australia when he was two (= two years old ) .
sentences.cn: 他两岁时，全家搬到了澳大利亚。

sentences.en: I drain the pasta, then I share it out between two plates.
sentences.cn: 我将意大利面滤干，然后平分到两个盘子里。

sentences.en: I undid the bottom two buttons of my yellow and grey shirt.
sentences.cn: 我解开了自己黄灰相间的衬衫上最下面的两个纽扣。

sentences.en: I’d like you to line up in twos, please.
sentences.cn: 请你们两个一组排好队。

sentences.en: I’ll be away for almost two weeks.
sentences.cn: 我要离开差不多两周时间。

sentences.en: It would be difficult to find two men who were more dissimilar.
sentences.cn: 很难找到彼此间差异更大的人了。

sentences.en: It's a long way to go for two people in their seventies.
sentences.cn: 对于两个七十几岁的人来说，这段路太远了。

sentences.en: Only two go down at the end of this season.
sentences.cn: 本赛季末只有两支队伍降级。

sentences.en: Striker Alan Smith was guilty of two glaring misses.
sentences.cn: 前锋艾伦·史密斯两次严重失误，将球射偏。

sentences.en: The London City Ballet has engaged two male dancers from the Bolshoi.
sentences.cn: 伦敦市芭蕾舞团从波修瓦芭蕾舞团聘来了两名男舞蹈演员。

sentences.en: The two airlines will cooperate on ticketing and schedules.
sentences.cn: 两家航空公司将在票务和航班安排上展开合作。

sentences.en: The two policemen were joined by another policeman also carrying a pistol.
sentences.cn: 另一名持枪警察和那两名警察会合了。

sentences.en: There will be a run-off between these two candidates on December 9th.
sentences.cn: 12月9日将举行这两位候选人的决胜选举。

sentences.en: Two men were helping police with their inquiries at Salisbury last night.
sentences.cn: 两名男子昨天夜里在索尔兹伯里接受了警方盘问。

sentences.en: We have to be there by two (= two o’clock ) .
sentences.cn: 我们得在两点之前到那里。

words.tran_cn: 两人一组，两个一组；两人玩的游戏，两人游戏

phrases.phrase: a —— or two (或 two or three ——)

phrases.tran_cn: 分成两个部分；分成两半

phrases.phrase: in two shakes (of a lamb's tail)

phrases.tran_cn: 根据现有事实推断，综合一切判断
我也是如此，对我同样适应

phrases.phrase: two by two (或 two and two)
phrases.tran_cn: 成双成对地，双双对对地

phrases.phrase: two can play at that game

phrases.tran_cn: adj. 二维的，平面的；二元的

phrases.phrase: two heads are better than one

phrases.tran_cn: [体]剩余二次击球（使对方多两次击球机会）
两相的；二相；二相的；双相的

trans.tran_cn: 两个，两个东西，两点钟，一对
trans.tran_en: in groups of two people or things
